          Chapman Family Donors Make a Collective Impact On Giving Day         

Thanks to the enthusiasm of the Chapman Family, Chapman University’s fifth annual Giving Day was an unrivaled success. The 24-hour online fundraising event surpassed its goal of 1,000 donations on April 25...
